name: The Playground (Kasmilus)
description:
"The Playground" is a game where you control a kid running around pretending to be a plane/tank/knight and trying to shoot imaginary targets.

The game was made for UE4 Spring Jam.

Controls:
WSAD/Left analog stick - Move
Space/A button - Attack
1-2-3/D-Pad - Transform into a plane/tank/knight

Tank deals more damage than knight which deals more damage than plane. All control differently, shoot at different distances. Only plane can fly through hoops.

Thanks to:
